    • createAddAndReturnNewDeal

      public Deal createAddAndReturnNewDeal(String CustomerID, Date dealDate, double shippingCost, ArrayList<String> licensePlates)
      creates and adds a new deal with the given properties and with the cars matching the given license plate list
      Parameters:
      CustomerID - Customer ID
      dealDate - date of the deal
      shippingCost - cost of shipping
      licensePlates - list of license plates
      Returns:
      the newly created deal
